CustomField.description: Editable by all Sales to outline the ERTC Outcome. This is to be used only until the ERTC Credit expires. To be evaluated in 6 months from creation date to if it needs to be removed/kept/repurposed
CustomField.inlineHelpText: What is the result of the conversation around ERTC?
CustomField.label: ERTC Conversation Outcome

value.fullName: Not Eligible - no shutdown or loss of revenue​
value.label: Not Eligible - no shutdown or loss of revenue​

value.fullName: Not Eligible - no eligible employees (all family/owner only)​
value.label: Not Eligible - no eligible employees (all family/owner only)​

value.fullName: Not Interested - Working with CPA, 3rd party, or another vendor​
value.label: Not Interested - Working with CPA, 3rd party, or another vendor​

value.fullName: Not Interested - Price is too high​
value.label: Not Interested - Price is too high​

value.fullName: Not Interested - Previously declined with another sales rep
value.label: Not Interested - Previously declined with another sales rep

value.fullName: Not Interested - Apprehensive Due to IRS Pause
value.label: Not Interested - Apprehensive Due to IRS Pause
